backend/main.mo: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to related files, components, tests, and metadata for APK delivery requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten short summaries of major frontend source files for reference or documentation.
frontend/.gitattributes: Configures Git to treat APKs and other binaries as binary and enforce LF for *.meta.json files.
frontend/android/.gitignore: Specifies ignored Android build artifacts, IDE files, and generated assets.
frontend/android/app/build.gradle: Android app Gradle config defining app metadata, SDK versions, build types, dependencies, and a task to copy web assets into the APK.
frontend/android/app/src/main/AndroidMan: Declares app permissions, main activity, launcher intent filters, and the deep‑link scheme for authentication.
frontend/android/app/src/main/assets/www: Empty placeholder file ensuring the assets/www directory is committed.
frontend/android/app/src/main/java/com/p: Main Android activity hosting a WebView, handling deep links, external auth navigation, and injecting runtime flags.
Utility for deciding when to open URLs externally and detecting return‑to‑app deep links via custom scheme.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/drawab: Splash screen drawable layering a white background with the launcher icon.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/layout: Layout containing a full‑screen WebView used by the app.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/mipmap: Round adaptive launcher icon using the same foreground and background as the standard icon.
Adaptive launcher icon definition with white background and foreground asset.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/values: Defines the app name string resource.
Defines the light no‑action‑bar app theme with a splash background.
frontend/android/build.gradle: Root Gradle build script configuring Kotlin, Android Gradle plugin versions, repositories, and clean task.
frontend/android/gradle.properties: Gradle configuration enabling AndroidX, Kotlin style settings, and JVM args.
frontend/android/gradle/wrapper/gradle-w: Specifies Gradle wrapper distribution details for version 8.2.
frontend/android/settings.gradle: Configures repository management and includes the Android app module.
frontend/docs/android-apk-build.md: Guide describing how to build, validate, stage, and deploy the Android APK.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry page loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/public/_headers: Netlify headers enforcing correct content types and caching for APK and metadata files.
frontend/public/_redirects: Netlify redirects ensuring APK files bypass SPA fallback and other routes fall back to index.html.
frontend/scripts/build-android-apk-debug: PowerShell script that builds the web app, builds the debug APK, validates it, copies it to public/assets, and generates metadata.
Shell script performing the same debug APK build, validation, copying, and metadata generation steps for Unix systems.
frontend/scripts/predeploy-stage-apk-ass: Wrapper script running APK staging and blocking deployment if validation fails.
frontend/scripts/stage-android-apk-asset: PowerShell staging script validating or copying the APK and regenerating metadata if needed.
Shell staging script ensuring the APK is valid, copying it if missing, and generating metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup and root component logic handling authentication flows, dialogs, and page routing.
frontend/src/components/admin/TermsManag: Admin panel for viewing, editing, and publishing customer terms, owner terms, and privacy policy, including save and publish actions with permission checks.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access-denied message with options to navigate home, log out, or go to admin login depending on the restricted route.
frontend/src/components/auth/BiometricEn: Dialog prompting users to enable biometric authentication, handling setup, cancellation, and errors.
frontend/src/components/auth/FactoryRese: Confirmation dialog for factory resetting the app, requiring a specific phrase and handling pending state and errors.
frontend/src/components/auth/PinSetupDia: Dialog for creating and confirming a 4‑digit PIN, with validation and local storage saving.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: User onboarding form for creating a profile, selecting a role, accepting terms, and optionally bootstrapping a super admin.
frontend/src/components/auth/UnlockDialo: Unlock dialog handling biometric and PIN authentication with error handling and UI states.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout with navigation, role‑based links, language selection, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeProvi: Context provider managing light/dark/system theme selection and persistence in localStorage.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeToggl: Toggle button switching between light and dark themes using ThemeProvider.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing authenticated or anonymous backend actors, invalidating queries on identity change.
Wrapper around Internet Identity login adding Android WebView detection and custom error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useBiometricAuth.ts: Hook enabling and verifying WebAuthn biometric authentication with credential storage and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity context and provider managing authentication state, login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalPin.ts: Provides PIN storage and verification logic using localStorage, sessionStorage, and a reactive store.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, admin bootstrap state, terms content, and factory reset actions via an actor API.
frontend/src/i18n/LanguageProvider.tsx: Implements a language context with English/French translations and persistent language selection using localStorage.
frontend/src/i18n/translations/en.ts: Contains the English translation dictionary for UI text across the app.
frontend/src/i18n/translations/fr.ts: Contains the French translation dictionary mirroring the English translation keys.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/legal/providedLegalText.ts: Exports customer and store‑owner legal terms text used in the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
Renders the admin dashboard with store, customer, order analytics, revenue stats, and store block/unblock controls using query hooks and analytics utilities.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSettingsPa: Displays admin settings including a panel for managing terms and policies with language‑aware titles.
frontend/src/pages/auth/RoleLoginPage.ts: Handles role‑based login, super‑admin bootstrapping, Android auth, and factory‑reset flows with navigation and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CartPage.tsx: Shows cart items grouped by store, supports quantity updates and removal, and links to checkout or store browsing.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CheckoutPage: Processes checkout for a specific store with payment method selection, biometrics or PIN authentication, and order placement.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CustomerDash: Provides quick‑access action cards for store access, search, marketplace, cart, and order history navigation.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CustomerSett: Lets customers view and update their profile details with validation, loading states, and translated labels.
frontend/src/pages/customer/MarketplaceP: Displays marketplace products with search, category filter, sorting, and add‑to‑cart functionality.
frontend/src/pages/customer/OrderDetailP: Shows detailed information for a specific order including items, status, and metadata.
frontend/src/pages/customer/OrdersPage.t: Lists active and completed customer orders with status badges and navigation to order details.
frontend/src/pages/customer/StoreAccessP: Simple form allowing customers to enter a store ID and navigate to that store’s page.
frontend/src/pages/customer/StoreDetailP: Displays store info, reviews, and product list with add‑to‑cart support and cart navigation.
frontend/src/pages/customer/StoreSearchP: Provides search and category filters to browse and select stores, with navigation to store detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/owner/InventoryPage.t: Manages viewing, creating, editing, and deleting store products with image upload and form dialog handling.
frontend/src/pages/owner/OrdersManagemen: Displays store orders grouped by status and allows updating order status through action buttons.
Shows the owner's stores and provides navigation to register stores, manage inventory, view orders, and edit settings.
frontend/src/pages/owner/OwnerSettingsPa: Loads and updates the owner's profile information including name, phone, and email.
frontend/src/pages/owner/StoreRegistrati: Provides a form to create a new store with name, category, location, and mobile money number.
frontend/src/pages/owner/StoreSettingsPa: Fetches store details and allows updating store name, category, location, and mobile money number.
frontend/src/pages/public/ApkDownloadPag: Page that fetches APK metadata, validates the deployed APK, and displays download or error states.
frontend/src/pages/terms/PrivacyPolicyPa: Loads and displays the privacy policy content with fallback error handling and a back button.
frontend/src/pages/terms/TermsAcceptance: Shows terms text from backend or fallback, requires user acceptance, and records acceptance before redirecting.
frontend/src/state/cartStore.ts: Zustand store managing per‑store cart items, quantities, totals, and persistence.
frontend/src/state/pinSessionStore.ts: In‑tab reactive store tracking PIN setup and unlock state with subscription support.
frontend/src/utils/analytics.ts: Utilities to aggregate order data into daily, weekly, and monthly revenue statistics.
frontend/src/utils/apkIntegrity.ts: Fetches APK metadata and validates the deployed APK's headers, size, and content type.
frontend/src/utils/geolocation.ts: Provides geolocation retrieval, distance calculation, and parsing of coordinate strings.
frontend/src/utils/logout.ts: Provides centralized logout and factory-reset cleanup logic that clears identity data, caches, storage, and navigates home.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Utility functions for formatting prices and computing effective and line totals using bigint values.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and cleaning URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/userProfile.ts: Generates display names and initials from a UserProfile object with sensible fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/webauthn.ts: Wraps WebAuthn availability checks and credential creation/authentication with platform authenticators.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state for PrimePost, focusing on fixing APK deployment issues and listing related requirements.
